lines.text: Doctor Sinclair and I ride together.
I wish you wouldn't threaten to kill my scientists right to their faces!
I think your experiment just got a mind of its own.
So, is this how you seduce all the girls?
Only physicists with hypothermia who are accused of being a terrorist.
Hundred bucks, kid didn't do it.
You got a nationwide manhunt for an innocent man?
Make sure nobody shoots him.
I'm being framed.
Ma'am, we just had eight city blocks disappear. The President of the United States talked to my boss at three this morning, he wants answers.
If someone's going down for this, it is not going to be I.
He was a 60 year old scientist who did nothing but good and they put a bag over his head.
Holy!... did you see that?
Whoa!
Do you understand the concept, Lyman... Poor Impulse Control?
[after shooting and killing Lyman Collier]
I didn't tell you, Lyman, but your retirement had already been arranged.
[Last line]
Anita, take a memo, to the director of Central Intelligences. "C-Systems... no longer a viable entity. Will be in contact." That's it.
What took you so long?
The bridge was up.

The incident in Chicago was tragic to be sure, but sometimes that is the price we must pay to insure our competitive edge in the future. We didn't intend to pay for our space exploration program with the lives of 10 American astronauts, but we did, nevertheless we must not waiver in our commitment to technological and scientific research and development!
